---
id: tag-artifact-version
title: "Tag Artifact Version"
description: "Assign a new tag to a specific version of an artifact. If the tag is assigned to a different version already, it will be moved to the new version."
sidebar_label: "Tag Artifact Version"

custom_edit_url: null
---

import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Tag Artifact Version"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/artifact/tag"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Assign a new tag to a specific version of an artifact. If the tag is assigned to a different version already, it will be moved to the new version.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["fqn","versionHash","newTag"],"properties":{"fqn":{"type":"object","description":"Fully qualified name of an artifact.","required":["source","author","name"],"properties":{"source":{"type":"string","description":"The source of the artifact."},"author":{"type":"string","description":"The author of the artifact."},"name":{"type":"string","description":"The name of the artifact."}},"title":"FQN"},"versionHash":{"type":"string","description":"The version hash of the artifact to tag."},"newTag":{"type":"string","description":"The new tag to assign to the artifact version."}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"201":{"description":"Tag assigned to artifact version successfully."},"400":{"description":"The request was malformed or invalid.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["error"],"properties":{"error":{"type":"string"}},"title":"ErrGeneric"}}}},"401":{"description":"The provided authentication credentials were invalid."},"403":{"description":"The authenticated user does not have permission to access the requested resource."},"404":{"description":"The requested resource was not found.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["error"],"properties":{"error":{"type":"string"}},"title":"ErrGeneric"}}}},"413":{"description":"The request payload is too large.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["error"],"properties":{"error":{"type":"string"}},"title":"ErrGeneric"}}}},"500":{"description":"An internal server error occurred. Look at the server logs for more details."}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
